articles.content: According to a recent poll conducted by StarkWare, 53% of the participants see cryptocurrencies as the future of finance. Unsurprisingly, young people (between 25 and 34 years old) are more bullish o… [+2727 chars]

articles.title: Vodafone Idea introduces two new prepaid plans with 30 days and 31 days validity - India Today
articles.description: After Reliance Jio and Airtel, telecom operator Vodafone Idea has now introduced prepaid plans with a validity of 30 and 31 days.

articles.author: Abhik Sengupta
articles.title: OnePlus Nord 2 User Injured After It Allegedly Exploded During A Phone Call - News18
articles.description: News18 Tech has reached out to OnePlus and the OnePlus Nord 2 user to verify the incident.
articles.content: Another incident has appeared on social media in which it is being claimed that a OnePlus Nord 2 unit has allegedly exploded during a phone call, causing injuries to the user. According to a Twitter … [+2833 chars]
